textchoicea: the lemurs liked his dad better

textchoicea: so the lizard will read the toucan's mind
textchoiceb: so the lizard will scare the toucan into telling him
textchoicec: so the lizard will hypnotize the toucan

textchoicea: They catch King Julien spying on them

textchoicea: King Julien knocks over his tower of matches

textchoiceb: Steam comes out of her ears

textchoicec: Giving them shields to fight the Foosa
